review.intent: Synthesize per-model behavioral summaries into concise profile cards that highlight each model's distinctive patterns without implying routing recommendations.
focus: Verify that profile claims are grounded in data from earlier sections and don't introduce new unsupported characterizations
Check that the 'not routing recommendations' caveat is present and prominent
Ensure the task type pattern table reflects the current task taxonomy (no stale types like 'simple')
Confirm profile strengths/weaknesses are balanced and don't read as marketing copy for either model
